pages.text: $(l)(Active-Offensive)/$$(br)Missiles target a single tile and deal damage to it, typically at least 2. Each missile has one stat: Damage. The damage determines how much damage is done to the targeted tile (obviously).

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)High damage missiles can be used to get around nasty passive abilities, as it will only trigger them once.$(li)When a missile hits an $(l:abilities/passive/energy_shield)$(thing)Energy Shield/$, it will only deal one damage to the shield regardless of what the missile's damage is.$(li)Try to avoid wasting high damage missiles on low health ships if you can.
